Author: ProblematicText
Text: I’m so sorry to hear :(  I just kinda feel hateful of myself because it’s like “I can’t believe I let myself get to the point where I still have so much more to do” if you know what I mean.  Healing vibes for you tho <3

Author: milllklatte
Text: God yes. Me too. The more fat I lose the more I recognize myself (always been a normal weight, developed BED, gained so much I went from average to obese, losing weight atm and hating it) and that’s the worst feeling in the world... like my flaws are so much more pronounced now that I have nothing to hide under. Stepping out of the haze that is a 3 year long binge cycle has just been extremely painful.
